data_table.description: Sample ID, body site where sample was obtained, analyte type, tumor status of sample, histological type, genotyping center of participants with primary breast cancer and involved in the "Study on longer adjuvant chemotherapy in Women with Early Breast Cancer" project.

variable.name: BODY_SITE
variable.description: Body site where sample was collected

variable.name: HISTOLOGICAL_TYPE
variable.description: Cell or tissue type or subtype of sample

variable.name: GENOTYPING_CENTER
variable.description: Name of the center which conducted genotyping
